Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, just east of the Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: The Lelion Beach and Park is a small beach in the Nylandian Bay forming half of the Lithium Inlet. At the beach, you can watch the various cargo ships entering and leaving the city, bringing with them a wealth of investments, both material and spiritual. Oceancrest's carnival and fair usually sets up tents on the lot to the west. Late spring is carnival time.
